name: TOLERANCE (topazz)
description:
TOLERANCE is a fast paced permadeath shooter, with quick and satisfying gunplay, and a brutal difficulty.

There will be 8 total chapters in the full release. If you die, you are sent back to the first level of the chapter you are in regardless of level.

Chapters consist of 4 regular levels, and 1 boss fight.

This game will test you, so try not to break anything lol

This is the Chapter 1 Demo, enjoy!

Its my first 3d game project, so its going to be very rough around the edges.
